column6: The Vapers Ph is a community page for the Philippine vaping community. Like and follow us here and on Twitter @thevapersph if you're interested in being a member and being part of the new vaping revolution!
column31: Clarisse Virgino said that the BFAD Public hearings on vapor products and heated tobacco products last October 6 & 8 were "one-sided". Get the full story here: https://manilastandard.net/business/economy-trade/336834/fda-accused-of-violating-filipino-vapers-rights.html Bong Go Vicente Tito Sotto
column34: THE APERS hi Ch "...one-sided, sided, pre-recorded lectures with cherry-picked questions that ignored the concerns of vapers, skipped scientific evidence, and violated the rights of consumers to be heard" -Clarisse Virgino (CAPHRA) on the BFAD Public Hearings on Vapor Products and HTPs last October 6&8 The Vapers PH @thevapersph

column31: "On questioning from Nueva Ecija Rep. Estrellita Suansing, the FDA admitted it received money from international anti-tobacco groups The Union and Bloomberg Initiative raising concerns on the agency’s independence and potential conflict of interest. " Read the full story here: https://manilastandard.net/business/economy-trade/336834/fda-accused-of-violating-filipino-vapers-rights.html
column35: Rep. Suansing questions the FDA on accepting grants from Bloomberg

column31: Mga bros! Alam niyo ba ang nangyari sa public consultation ng FDA? “...the FDA held “moro-moro” hearings that ignored the inputs from stakeholders who will be directly affected by the draft guidelines.” Bong Go Pia Cayetano Sen. Ralph Recto
column35: FDA accused of violating Filipino vapers' rights
column36: Tobacco harm reduction advocates have accused the Philippines Food and Drug Administration of violating the rights of Filipino vapers and consumers when the agency allegedly delivered lectures, instead of holding public consultations, on the draft guidelines for the regulation of e-cigarettes and he...

column31: "The alleged “moro-moro” hearings came in the wake of allegations the FDA received foreign funding from anti-tobacco groups prompting the House leadership to call for an investigation on the agency’s potential conflict of interest and bias." Ito ang link sa istorya mga ka-hipak: https://manilastandard.net/business/economy-trade/336834/fda-accused-of-violating-filipino-vapers-rights.html Bong Go Vicente Tito Sotto
